name: d3-process-control
description: d3 utility to apply nelsons rules of process control to a set of data

scripts.build: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -c rollup.config.js -f umd --amd.id d3-process-control -n d3_process_control -o build/d3-process-control.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-process-control.js -c -m -o build/d3-process-control.min.js && rm -f build/d3-process-control.zip && zip -j build/d3-process-control.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-process-control.js build/d3-process-control.min.js
